description: OpenPGP implementation for Android.
name: APG

description: بدجن للماك أو  إس عشرة ( لا  تنسى تشغيل OTR)   .
name: Adium

description: عُملة ند للند  رقميّة بدون  سلطة مركزيّة.
name: Bitcoin

description: IRC instant messaging gateway that supports a bunch of protocols.
name: BitlBee

description: Encrypted, decentralized P2P messaging service based on Bitcoin technology.
notes: Bitmessage is a promising alternative to email, but it has not yet been audited by security professionals. Use at your own risk. If you decide to try out Bitmessage, make sure to generate a completely random ID to greatly reduce the probability of ID collisions.
name: Bitmessage

description: محادثات  صوتيّة  مشفّرة  ومجانية  للأندرويد.
name: CSipSimple

description: دردشة مشفرة على iOS.
notes: The Guardian Project hosts a fantastic how-to guide to chatting securely on Android.
name: ChatSecure

description: دردشة مشفرة على iOS.
notes: The Guardian Project hosts a fantastic how-to guide to chatting securely on Android.
name: ChatSecure

description: DNS hosting service with DNSCrypt, DNSSec, and Namecoin support.
name: CloudNS

description: Uses mobile phones, computers, and wireless routers to create decentralized mesh networks.
notes: Please read [Commotion's Warning Label](https://commotionwireless.net/understanding-commotions-warning-label).
name: Commotion

description: Private and encrypted instant messaging within the web browser.
name: Cryptocat

description: البرامج  الثّابتة إلى  ما بعد البيع  لهواتف  الأندرويد.
name: CyanogenMod

description: A tool to secure communications between a client and a DNS resolver.
name: DNSCrypt

description: توزيعة جنو/لينكس شهيرة و أخلاقية.
name: Debian

description: Free open source client for the Desura distribution service.
notes: Desurium is client software. You will still have to trust and depend on the proprietary Desura service.
name: Desurium

description: توقف مواقع خارجية من تتبعك.
name: Disconnect

description: بحث على شبكة الإنترنت مجهول وغير مُسجّل.
notes:
DuckDuckGo is a software-as-a-service (SaaS) hosted around the world that provides you with anonymous search results from [these sources](https://dukgo.com/help/en_US/results/sources). DDG open source components are [available here](https://github.com/duckduckgo).

There is also a DuckDuckGo hidden service at [3g2upl4pq6kufc4m.onion](http://3g2upl4pq6kufc4m.onion) for Tor users.
name: DuckDuckGo

description: إضافة OpenPGP للـثندربرد/Icedove.
notes: [Here is a guide](https://securityinabox.org/en/thunderbird_main) by Security In A Box to encrypting your email with Mozilla Thunderbird, GNU Privacy Guard (GPG), and Enigmail.
name: Enigmail

description: جدول الخادم  متعدّد  المستخدمين.
notes: The EtherCalc service does not encrypt your data transmission with HTTPS, and there's no privacy policy regarding what is done with your data either. Download and run your own EtherCalc server if you care about privacy.
name: EtherCalc

description: وثائق  تعاونيّة،  مفتوحة  المصدر في  الوقت  الحقيقي.
notes: The etherpad project maintains a list of [sites that run etherpad services](https://github.com/ether/etherpad-lite/wiki/Sites-that-run-Etherpad-Lite). Please only choose from the services that use SSL, and research the site's background before trusting them with your data.
name: Etherpad

description: تطبيق يوميّة  وبريد  إلكتروني  مجاني .
name: Evolution

description: توزيعة جنو/لينكس سريعة، مستقرة و فعالة.
name: Fedora

description: A free BSD-derived operating system.
name: FreeBSD

description: شبكة لامركزية مقاومة للرقابة .
name: Freenet

description: A non-commercial open grassroots initiative to support free radio networks around the world.
name: Freifunk

description: GNUnet is a fully free P2P network.
name: GNUnet

description: Light and fast IM client for GNU/Linux and Windows—OTR support via plugin.
name: Gajim

description: توزيعة حول الإختيار، التحكم والأمن.
name: Gentoo

description: Cross-platform IRC client.
notes: HexChat does not offer encrypted IRC by default. You need to enable the FiSHLiM plugin for IRC message encryption.
name: HexChat

description: مشروع  الإنترنت  الغير مرئية.
name: I2P

description: دردشة نصيّة  ومحادثة  فيديو مشفرة.
notes:
Jitsi may [request non-secure information during encrypted chat](https://github.com/nylira/prism-break/issues/291) if you paste a link into it. 
Also, if Jitsi is set up to use Tor, it may [leak DNS information](https://trac.jitsi.org/ticket/1060) by not using Tor for DNS resolution.

Lastly, note that Jitsi records chat history in unencrypted form.
name: Jitsi

description: عميل بريد  إلكتروني  كيدي داعم للـGPG.
name: Kontact

description: Free software VPN client (3rd generation) derived from Openswan.
name: Libreswan

description: Encrypted voice and video client.
name: Linphone

description: عقد إجتماعية موزعة وفيدرالية.
name: Lorea

description: تشفير OpenPGP  للبريد  الإلكتروني.
name: Mailvelope

description: Free virtual globe and world atlas.
name: Marble

description: You can also run self-hosted instances of MediaCrush.
name: MediaCrush

description: You can also run self-hosted instances of MediaCrush.
name: MediaCrush

description: Meta search engine that proxies your queries to multiple search providers.
name: MetaGer

description: خادم موقع  إجتماعي  لامركزي، خاص .
name: Movim

description: دردشه صوتيّة  مشفّرة وذات  زمن الوصول  منخفض.
name: Mumble

description: DNS موزع مبني على تكنولوجيا بتكوين.
name: Namecoin

description: شبكة أي2بيه  مجهولة  للأندرويد.
name: Nightweb

description: تفعيل جافا سكريبت، جافا، وفلاش فقط للمواقع التي تثق بها.
notes:
Install **NoScript** and enable ‘Forbid scripts globally’ to improve the security of your browser by preventing 0day JavaScript attacks. This is a drastic option as it will render many websites unusable as they rely heavily on JavaScript.

NoScript offers a whitelist you can use to selectively enable JavaScript for sites you trust, but this is considered [especially bad for your anonymity](https://www.torproject.org/docs/faq.html.en#TBBJavaScriptEnabled) if you're using NoScript with the **Tor Browser Bundle**.
name: NoScript

description: A secure BSD operating system.
name: OpenBSD

description: Open, democratic, and anti-censorship DNS provider.
notes: OpenNIC has not adopted an official policy concerning log query privacy/anonymization. More information [here](http://wiki.opennicproject.org/Tier2).
name: OpenNIC

description: توزيعة جنو/لينكس مستقرة، سهلة الإستخدام لمهام مختلفة .
name: OpenSUSE

description: خريطة عالمية,  تعاونية و حرة   .
name: OpenStreetMap

description: Free software VPN client.
name: OpenVPN

description: Free software VPN client derived from FreeS/WAN.
name: Openswan

description: وسيط تور للأندرويد.
name: Orbot

description: OsmAnd (OSM Automated Navigation Directions) is a map and navigation app that uses OpenStreetMap data.
name: OsmAnd

description: برنامج دردشه  مفتوح المصدر.
notes:
Pidgin stores your IM account passwords in [plain text](https://developer.pidgin.im/wiki/PlainTextPasswords). You can avoid this by (1) not saving your password in Pidgin, (2) encrypting your file system with software like [TrueCrypt](http://www.truecrypt.org/), or (3) storing your Pidgin password securely with the Debian package [pidgin-gnome-keyring](https://code.google.com/p/pidgin-gnome-keyring/).

Pidgin with OTR and dbus enabled has a local security bug. See the [upstream bug report](https://developer.pidgin.im/ticket/14830) for more information and possible workarounds.
name: Pidgin

description: منصّة متصفّح  صور مجانيّة.
notes: Piwigo does not encrypt any of your data by default.
name: Piwigo

description: تحليلات  شبكيّة ذاتية  الإستضافة،  مفتوحة  المصدر.
name: Piwik

description: Free online encrypted notepad.
notes: ProtectedText encrypts/decrypts text in the browser, and password (or it's hash) is never sent to the server - so that text can't be decrypted even if requested by authorities.
name: ProtectedText

description: Fedora/Xen-based OS designed to provide strong security through isolation.
name: Qubes

description: توزيعة  أندرويد حرة  بالكامل.
name: Replicant

description: برنامج  إتصالات الند  للند حر و آمن.
notes:
Note that RetroShare has not been thoroughly audited by security professionals for possible security issues.

For those of you without a server, RetroShare is probably the easiest way to start your own encrypted social network.
name: RetroShare

description: حسابات بريد  إلكتروني  خاصة وآمنة.
notes: Riseup's services may also be accessed via their Tor Hidden Service addresses. A list is [available here](https://www.riseup.net/en/tor#riseups-tor-hidden-services).
name: Riseup

description: مراقبة  الإصدار ذاتي  الإستضافة و  الملفات  المتزامنة  ذاتيّة  الإستضافة.
name: SparkleShare

description: بحث على شبكة الإنترنت خاصّة وغير مُسجّل .
notes: Startpage is a SaaS hosted in the USA and the Netherlands that provides you with anonymous Google search and image results through a free proxy.
name: Startpage

description: Lightweight and user-friendly e-mail client.
name: Sylpheed

description: برنامج منتدى  مجهول و موزّع.
name: Syndie

description: توزيعة حية على قرص أو USB مصممة للخصوصية.
name: Tails

description: Protocol for realtime decentralized communication and personal data storage.
notes:
Tent mentions that it's still in alpha:
*"Remember, Tent is still in alpha, so it’s not safe to use with information you would not want to be public and should not be considered reliable."*
name: Tent

description: The Tor network offers access to *.onion websites.
name: Tor

description: The Tor network offers access to *.onion websites.
name: Tor

description: Add-on that makes Thunderbird/Icedove connect through Tor.
notes: TorBirdy is in beta and should be considered experimental. Please make sure that before using it, you are aware of the known issues and leaks by reading the "Before using TorBirdy" and "Known TorBirdy" Issues sections on the project website.
name: TorBirdy

description: Anonymous, decentralized P2P chat built on Tor Hidden Services.
name: TorChat

description: Extensible and customisable chat client for IRC and XMPP/Jabber.
notes: WeeChat does not offer encryption by default, but there is a FiSH encryption plugin available.
name: WeeChat

description: VM-friendly OS based on Debian and Tor focused on anonymity, privacy and security.
notes: Whonix is designed to be run inside of a virtualization package like [VirtualBox](https://www.virtualbox.org/). VirtualBox can be installed on Windows, Linux, OS X, and Solaris. This means that if you're stuck using Windows or OS X for whatever reason, you can install VirtualBox and use Whonix to increase your privacy and security.
name: Whonix

description: موقع ويب  مجاني/مدونة  مجانية CMS.
notes:
WordPress does not encrypt any of your data by default.

Using avatars in WordPress will activate Gravatar, which which will send your email address to gravatar.com. Avatars are activated by default and can be turned off under "Settings > Discussion > Avatars".
name: WordPress

description: OTR-encrypted instant messaging for Android.
name: Xabber

description: بحث شبكي لامركزي.
name: YaCy

description: موقع ويب ذو  الوسائط  مجانيّة CMS.
notes: Zenphoto does not encrypt any of your data by default.
name: Zenphoto

description: Open source, federated social network.
name: buddycloud

description: موقع إجتماعي  موزّع يديره  المجتمع.
name: diaspora*

description: A free securely-hosted online poll, with a privacy-enhanced version.
name: dudle

description: خادم ويب  إجتماعي  مجاني ومفتوح  المصدر.
name: friendica

description: Debian توزيعة جنو/لينكس مجانية بالكامل تعتمد على توزيعة .
name: gNewSense

description: بيانات  سحابية تحت  تحكمّك.
name: ownCloud

description: خادم تيار  إجتماعي ذاتي  الإستضافة.
name: pump.io

name: strongSwan
